source: Nevada 211, Nevada Department of Veterans Services, U.S.VETS, Veteran Services Resources of Nevada

resources.name: Nevada 211
resources.description: Free 24/7 resource line connecting veterans to housing, employment, mental health, compensation, pension, and health services

resources.name: Nevada Department of Veterans Services
resources.description: State agency providing benefits, services, and support for Nevada veterans

resources.name: U.S.VETS Las Vegas
resources.description: Operates three residential facilities providing transitional and permanent housing with employment services to homeless veterans

resources.name: HELP USA Nevada - Veteran Apartments
resources.description: Provides 75 units of transitional housing with supportive services for homeless veterans with multiple barriers

resources.name: Veterans Village of Las Vegas
resources.description: Provides transitional housing, mental health services, crisis intervention, and employment support to homeless veterans

resources.name: Salvation Army Southern Nevada - Veteran Services
resources.description: Provides emergency assistance, housing support, and social services to veterans in Las Vegas area

resources.name: Veterans Resource Centers of America - Reno/Northern Nevada
resources.description: Provides temporary financial assistance, VA benefits support, behavioral health services, and homelessness prevention

resources.name: Northern Nevada Veterans Resource Center
resources.description: Provides homelessness prevention and rapid re-housing assistance for low and extremely low-income veterans

resources.name: Hospitality House - Veterans Housing
resources.description: Provides housing programs and supportive services for veterans

resources.name: Veterans Affairs Emergency Housing Hotline
resources.description: 24/7 emergency housing assistance for homeless veterans
